short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to save images with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save image with a customizable keyboard + mouse shortcut or via context menu.

Note: to make it truly one click, you need to change turn off "Ask where to save each file before downloading" in your Chrome settings. Otherwise Chrome will ask you for each file where to save.
